title: Lost promo series due to client bug
body:
sure Im only bronze, but Im trying to climb. in promos for B1, lost game 1 and when in the lobby for my second game the client popped up with a message saying "there was an error selecting your champion". Again, yes Im only bronze so Its not such a tragic loss (Im on 83 lp I just need to keep going ) but I cant imagine how annoying this would be for say maybe a diamond player or something.

is this a common issue with the client? 
Has this happened to anyone else?

replies.body: i think its because you didnt lock in your champ

sorry i should of probably specified a bit better. after clicking lock in the message came up. it did it to me 3 times before the timer ran out
